name: The Shadow Stalker
description: A figure made of absences. It stands where the light isn't. It is watching you.

success_effect.message: You strike the shadow. It recoils, briefly solid.

fail_effect.message: Your hand passes through it. The cold burns.

success_effect.message: You scramble away, leaving the shadow behind.

fail_effect.message: You slip on the ice. It is closer now.

success_effect.message: You merge with the darkness. It seems confused.

fail_effect.message: You knock over a can. It turns towards you.

success_effect.message: You speak the Old Tongue. It pauses, listening.

fail_effect.message: It screams in your mind. A thousand voices at once.

entity_moves.message: The shadow extends a limb towards you.
